meanings.definition: A person who does not smoke tobacco.
meanings.sent1: Nonsmokers enjoy clean air and healthy lungs.
meanings.sent2: My friends are all nonsmokers, so I never have to worry about secondhand smoke.
meanings.sent3: At the party, the nonsmokers were the first to finish their snacks because they didn't need smoke breaks.
meanings.sent4: The garden was a sanctuary for the nonsmokers, a place untouched by the haze of cigarettes.
meanings.sent5: In the park, the nonsmokers stood out like beacons of fresh air amidst the cloud of smoke.

meanings.sent1: The nonsmokers gathered together to promote a smoke-free environment.
meanings.sent2: We invited all the nonsmokers to the meeting to discuss the new smoking policy.
meanings.sent3: The nonsmokers formed a club where they could socialize without the smell of cigarettes lingering around.
meanings.sent4: The team of nonsmokers worked diligently to raise awareness about the dangers of smoking.
meanings.sent5: In the crowd, the nonsmokers stood united, a silent force against the habit of smoking.
